name: Gemstone/Mineral Tumblr Post Icons
description: These transparent gemstone tumblr post icons come in three shapes: triangular, rounded rectangle, and square, and have a simple lifting animation. This first set is opals, second is bismuth, third is lapis lazuli, fourth is rose quartz, and fifth is tourmaline. If you want a particular mineral added to this set, have a question, etc., contact me @eatyourheirs. I'm happy to make more.
